string.name: create_party_help
string.Data:
Create a party

To create a party just press the button named "create a new party"

Join a party

To join a party press the button join a party and either type in a given access code or scan a partys qr code with barcode scanner (must be installed)

Save a party

To save a party just press the button named "save party" and choose name to save your party. All your saved parties can be found under the menu "saved parties" and all parties can be deleted in settings.

Leave a party

To leave a party just go to the "Home" screen of the app and simply press the "X" button which is shown when you are connected to a party

string.name: search_help_text_view
string.Data:
General info

To be able to search for songs or artists you need to be connected to a party (either created party or joined).

Search for Songs

To search for songs just hit the name of the song you want to find.

Search for Artists

To search for artists just hit the name of the artist you whish to find songs for. The artists most popular songs will be displayed.

Clear recent search history

To clear the recent search tags go to settings and press "Clear search history". All your history should now be removed :)
